rooms.name: Spawn Room
rooms.description: You are in a inside of a room with 4 walls. There are family pictures on all of the walls. You can see a sword, shield, bow, and a spear. the room has one exit leading west.

rooms.name: Test Dummy Room
rooms.description: You are in a room with a skeleton in the middle with one exit heading west.

rooms.name: Boon Room
rooms.description: You are in a room with three glowing boons.

rooms.name: F1 1st Attack Room
rooms.description: You are in a room with a few monsters and two exits heading South and West.

rooms.name: F1 2nd Attack Room West
rooms.description: You are in a room with a few monsters and two exits heading West and East.

rooms.name: F1 2nd Attack Room South
rooms.description: You are in a room with a few monsters and two exits heading West and South.

rooms.name: F1 3rd Attack Room West 1
rooms.description: You are in a room with a few monsters and two exits heading East and South.

rooms.name: F1 3rd Attack Room East
rooms.description: You are in a room with a few monsters and two exits heading East and West.

rooms.name: F1 3rd Attack Room West 2
rooms.description: You are in a room with a few monsters and two exits heading West and South.

rooms.name: F1 3rd Attack Room South
rooms.description: You are in a room with a few monsters and two exits heading West and South.

rooms.name: F1 NPC Room
rooms.description: You are in a room with a man with a chain attached to him connecting to a boulder and one exit heading West.

rooms.name: F1 Mini Boss Room
rooms.description: You are in a room with two giant bony skeletons with bombs on their backs blocking the one exit heading West.
